Antal rum: 39. not great value as room only, a little tired - would have been better with breakfast included at Â£85 Staff were extremely efficient and friendly. The room was very clean and well appointed.The hotel provides comfortable surroundings and the garden is very pleasant. The continental breakfast was disappointing - very little fruit offered, no croissant/ danish pastry etc to warrant the description as continental. The bedroom, while well appointed, was very stuffy and really needs air conditioning in hot weather. Jamie Drew & his team & Amanda were very professional & discreet with our Funeral Party.Staying at the Hotel was pleasant & the facilities excellent.Maybe we can visit at a more sociable time on our next visit It was modern, nicely decorated and appointed, quiet and calm. No parking difficulties. Easy to find. Comfortable. Nothing fell short - though there was a problem with fully closing the main curtain in Room 30 - it needs mending. Friendly of staff, very knowledgeable - even knew our room numbers when we returned to reception to get our keys. We stayed two nights - golden wedding reception lunch on the Sunday, brilliant food, service and ambience. Lovely warm, comfortable room. Only small niggle - would appreciate a drinking glass in the room. The staff in the Brookfield Hotel were verycourteous and polite and very helpful. The Breakfast although this was extra was exremely good and hot. the staff were excellent from waiters to night porter. The only downside was the fact the bath under the taps was a little bit dirty but of no real consequence All the staff were very friendly and helpful. The receptionist stood out as the most helpful and knowledgeable. One of the reasons I liked the hotel was that it was small and friendly, extremely clean and the breakfast was excellent. The bed was quite squeaky. Some noise in early hours downstairs staff moving about and doors banging...I Huess setting up table for breakfast/cleaning at 4.00am My wifew and I thought we had very good value for what we paid.Courteous staff, good sized, clean room, polite service at the bar prior to leaving for dinner and a good choice, well served breakfast.

Jag har bestï¿½llt med 8GB och vill komplettera med 2x8GB Crucial-minne. Nï¿½r jag jï¿½mfï¿½r en del svenska siter med Crucials artikelnummer sï¿½ stï¿½mmer inte dessa. Enligt vad jag har lï¿½st behï¿½ver jag fï¿½ljande spec: DDR3 PC3-12800 204-pin SO-DIMM CL11 Unbuffered Non-ECC 1.35V Nï¿½r jag tittar pï¿½ exempelvis Komplett.se eller Inwarehouse.se sï¿½ finns dessa minnen med artikelnummer CT2KIT102464BF160B (2x-kit) fï¿½r 649 SEK. Men nï¿½r jag tittar pï¿½ Crucial.com och anvï¿½nder deras minneskonfigurator fï¿½r att se vilka minnen som rekommenderas fï¿½r iMac 27" Late 2012 sï¿½ hittar jag ett liknande kit med artikelnummer CT3650278. ï¿½r det nï¿½gon som vet om det ï¿½r samma minne? Jag vill gï¿½rna hï¿½lla mig till Crucials minnen dï¿½ dessa har verifierats fungera vï¿½l ihop med de RAM-minnen som Apple anvï¿½nder utan konflikter och nedsatt frekvens (lï¿½gre ï¿½n 1600MHz). Jag har ï¿½ven kollat pï¿½ Macoteket men de har inte Crucials minnen och de har inte ens bemï¿½dat sig med att uppdatera sin minneskonfigurator med nya iMac. Postad 21 december 2012 klockan 11:15 Varfï¿½r bestï¿½ller du inte bara direkt frï¿½n crucial? Bra priser, gratis frakt, snabba leveranser, bra support. Jag har sjï¿½lv bestï¿½llt 32 GB frï¿½n crucial fï¿½r ett tag sen och leveransen tog 3 dagar och det kostade knappt 1800 kr. Redigerat av erge, 21 december 2012 klockan 11:16. 0

text: Varfï¿½r jag blev socialist Fï¿½rr var det mï¿½jligt fï¿½r mï¿½nga mï¿½nniskor att betrakta krig som nï¿½gonting slumpartat, som onï¿½diga avbrott i normala och fredliga handels- och kulturfï¿½rhï¿½llanden mellan nationerna. Krigsutbrott sades vara orsakade av diplomaters dumhet eller felberï¿½kningar . Eller ocksï¿½ av hï¿½gmodiga och lï¿½ttretade statsmï¿½n, som reagerade ï¿½veremotionellt pï¿½ sï¿½dana hï¿½ndelser som mordet pï¿½ den ï¿½sterrikiske ï¿½rkehertigen Frans Ferdinand i Sarajevo i juni 1914. Ofta fï¿½refï¿½ll det som om krig kunde ha undvikits och mï¿½nga bï¿½cker har skrivits efter tidigare krig fï¿½r att visa att det aldrig skulle ha intrï¿½ffat om den ene eller andre utrikesministern handlat annorlunda eller varit mer vï¿½lbalanserad. Idag hï¿½rs denna ï¿½sikt inte lika ofta. Till stor del har den fï¿½rstï¿½rts av hï¿½ndelserna som ledde fram till tvï¿½ vï¿½rldskrig och av de 'kalla krigen' som pï¿½gï¿½tt sedan andra vï¿½rldskrigets slut. Mordet i Sarajevo var bara en hï¿½ndelse som utnyttjades av hï¿½rskarklassgrupper fï¿½r att befrï¿½mja deras ambitioner. Det brï¿½t ut efter mï¿½nga ï¿½rs upprustning av Tyskland och hennes allierade pï¿½ den ena sidan och Storbritannien och hennes allierade pï¿½ den andra. Den expansionistiska tyska kapitalismen drevs att utmana bï¿½de Ryssland och de tidigare kolonialmakterna som dominerade vï¿½rlden. Det stod ï¿½nnu mer klart vid andra vï¿½rldskrigets utbrott. Det var uppenbart att krigsutbrottet 1939 inte kom ovï¿½ntat. Vid den tidpunkten insï¿½g alla att de europeiska makterna ivrigt fï¿½rberett sig fï¿½r denna mï¿½jlighet ï¿½nda sedan nazistregimens uppkomst i Tyskland 1933, och Tysklands ï¿½terkomst som en stï¿½rre militï¿½rmakt. ï¿½tminstone ett ï¿½r innan krigsutbrottet var de europeiska folken nedtyngda av fruktan att det inte kunde undvikas lï¿½nge till. Sedan 1945 har vi upplevt mï¿½nga ï¿½r med 'kallt krig' mellan Ryssland och USA och deras respektive allierade, och senare det 'kalla kriget' mellan Ryssland och Kina. De rivaliserande grupperna har ï¿½gnat sig ï¿½t upprustning och andra krigsfï¿½rberedelser som varit ï¿½ppet inriktade pï¿½ ett sannolikt krig mot en namngiven rival. Ett av syftena med denna artikelserie ï¿½r att visa att krig i den moderna vï¿½rlden varken beror pï¿½ enskilda ministrars undvikliga misstag eller pï¿½ att de fï¿½r sitt eget nï¿½je sï¿½ker krig fï¿½r dess egen skull. Striden med vï¿½pnat vï¿½ld ï¿½r en utvidgning och fï¿½ljd av en underliggande strid. I den deltar alla stater och den pï¿½gï¿½r hela tiden inom handeln och andra omrï¿½den. Krig ï¿½terspeglar regeringars beslutsamhet att fï¿½rsvara eller vinna kontroll ï¿½ver vï¿½rdefulla besittningar med vï¿½pnad makt nï¿½r andra medel misslyckats. Krigets syfte ï¿½r att vinna eller bevara herravï¿½ldet ï¿½ver territorier med rika mineralfyndigheter, viktiga handelsvï¿½gar till lands, sjï¿½ss, eller i luften, eller omrï¿½den dï¿½r varor kan sï¿½ljas och kapital investeras.
